Html:
I was meddling around with glyphs a bit on 2.2.4, and for some reason when I have Glyph of Savage Roar, and Glyph of Shred enabled and then select Mangle as additional Glyph, it shows the dps gain from the mangle glyph as -37,86 - that can't by right, can it? Even if I wouldn't gain anything it should never cost me dps to have an additional glyph, should it?

As always thx for the continiuos work on this great programm.

@Astrylian

I could reproduce on my cat by removing ranks from Shredding Attacks.
Ah, so basically there's a situation where more mangling is actually better, but just not ALL mangling.

Here's the file. Talent Spec is set to the preconfigured "Cat" spec.
